channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DraftKings Promo: Bet $5, Get $300 If Your Bet Wins, Plus Three Months of NBA League Pass
item.description: Bet $5, get $300 in bonus bets with DraftKings for new users. Plus, you can get three months of NBA League pass if your bet wins.

item.title: FanDuel Promo Code: Bet $5, Get $150 in Bonus Bets If Your Bet Wins
item.description: Bet $5 or more, get $150 back in bonus bets if your bet wins with our FanDuel sportsbook offer for new users after their first bet wins.

item.title: BetMGM Bonus Code: Bet $10, Get Up to $1,500 Paid Back in Bonus Bets
item.description: Bet $10 or more, get up to $1,500 back in bonus bets if your first wager loses with our BetMGM sportsbook offer for new users.

item.title: Best Sports Betting Apps 2025: Top Betting Sites Reviewed
item.description: Compare the best sports betting apps and sites for 2025. See reviews, bonuses, and features to help choose the right sportsbook for your needs.

item.title: bet365 Bonus Code: Bet $5, Get $200 with Code FOX365
item.description: Claim the bet365 Sportsbook promo code for a first bet offer worth up to $1,000 back in bonus bets if your wager loses.

item.title: Predictions and everything you need to know about MVP, Cy Young and more
item.description: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 collect their hardware this week -- starting tonight with the Rookies of the Year.

item.title: 'Being in the NFL is hard ... being an Eagle is harder'
item.description: There is a demand for greatness that fuels achievement and creates an uneasiness for the current Eagles.

item.title: MLB, sportsbooks agree to limit on pitch bets
item.description: Prominent U.S. sportsbooks are establishing a betting limit on baseball wagers centered on individual pitches in an attempt to decrease manipulation, ...

item.title: 'This is not football!': Inside Packers-Eagles battle over banning the tush push
item.description: Sources said the NFL essentially recruited the Packers to submit the tush push ban proposal.

item.title: Why did the Giants fire head coach Brian Daboll? What's next?
item.description: Who is the best fit for New York with Daboll out? What effect will this have on the locker room?
